mapper.select: SELECT QA_TY_L FROM PLT_CHT_QA_EVAL_SHT WHERE QA_YM = #{QA_YM_TO} AND QA_TY_CD = #{QA_TY_CD} GROUP BY QA_TY_L, QA_TY_L_CD ORDER BY QA_TY_L_CD
SELECT QA_TY_M FROM PLT_CHT_QA_EVAL_SHT WHERE QA_YM = #{QA_YM_TO} AND QA_TY_CD = #{QA_TY_CD} GROUP BY QA_TY_M, QA_TY_M_CD ORDER BY QA_TY_M_CD
SELECT QA_TY_L FROM PLT_CHT_QA_EVAL_SHT WHERE QA_YM = #{QA_YM_TO} AND QA_TY_CD = #{QA_TY_CD} GROUP BY QA_TY_L, QA_TY_L_CD ORDER BY QA_TY_L_CD
